Name: Custom Dice
Effect: Control your next dice roll to be a value between 1-10

Name: Rare Development
Effect: Select between a random rare building to build on your current tile

Name: Rare Loot Bag
Effect: Randomly generate 2 rare rarity items

Name: Reclaimation
Effect: Remove all tile effects from the current tile

Name: Boundary Adjustment
Effect: Move the current building to a chosen nearby location

Name: Protected Site
Effect: Apply the Protected tile effect to the current tile. buildings on tile have base value increased by 30, no more changes can be made to the tile or building.

Name: Corner Cutting
Effect: Apply the Cut Corners building effect. Increase the base value of the building by 20, but destroys the building in 4 turns

Name: Disaster Prevention
Effect: Apply Disaster Prevention building effect. Base value reduce by 10, multiplier increase by 0.5x

Name: Rare Category Priority
Effect: Increase probability to draw selected category during build phase for the next 3 turns. Does not stack

Name: Legendary Development
Effect: Select between random legendary building to build on your current tile

Name: Duplicate
Effect: Duplicate a selected building with all its effects, will not work on buildings at max limit

Name: Historical Landmark
Effect: Apply Historical tile effect. Buildings earn 1x more money

Name: Superior Design
Effect: Apply superior building effect. Increase building base value by 50

Name: Legendary Category Priority
Effect: Drastically Increase probability to draw selected category during build phase for the next 3 turns

Name: Transfer
Effect: Transfer all building effect from another building to the current Building, Duplicates do not get moved

Name: Teleport
Effect: Move to any desired tile

Name: Epic Development
Effect: Select between random epic buildings to build on your current tile

Name: Epic Loot Bag
Effect: Randomly generate 2 epic rarity items

Name: Transport
Effect: Move a selected building to any location

Name: Restructuring
Effect: Swap the selected building effects between two selected buildings

Name: Heritage Site
Effect: Apply the heritage tile effect to current tile. Increase buildings multiplier by 1.5x

Name: Smooth Land
Effect: Apply the smooth tile effect to current tile. Increase building effect range by 2

Name: Epic Category Priority
Effect: Greatly increase probability to draw selected category during build phase for the next 3 turns

Name: Relocation
Effect: Move a current building to a random empty location

Name: Reversal
Effect: Reverse the direction you travel when you next roll the dice

Name: Common Development
Effect: Select between random common building to build on the current tile

Name: Common Loot Bag
Effect: Randomly generate 3 common rarity items

Name: Restoration
Effect: Removes all building effects from the building

Name: Valued Land
Effect: Apply valued tile effect to the current tile. building earns 0.25x more

Name: Basic Renovation
Effect: Apply the Renovated building effect. Increase a the buildings base value by 5

Name: Cramped
Effect: Apply cramped building effect. Increase base value by 10 reduce multiplier by 0.2x

Name: Common Category Priority
Effect: Slightly increase probability to draw selected category during build phase for the next 3 turns. Does not stack
